channel.title: Hello! I am Daniel
channel.description:
I am pretty new.
After reading Start Small, Stay Small! I thought I might be able to do something. I started selling my product 6 months ago and I've even sold a few licenses! I never thought I would get that far! I enjoy talking to customers and making a product that they (and I) want.
I'm looking to pick up tips to become more successful and engage in the community. I found you via Andy Brice through the Business of Software forum. I really enjoyed the podcast with him, and now I've listened to the one from Rachel Andrew. Good, inspiring interviews!

item.title: Hello! I am Daniel
item.dc:creator: ian
item.description:
Awesome, welcome Dan! Glad you found us. We do the best we can

Read full topic
